snippet: Gay rights advocates say disputed therapies to “overcome” homosexuality have caused emotional harm to teenagers.
abstract: California becomes first state to ban the use of disputed therapies to 'overcome' homosexuality on minors, a step hailed by gay rights groups across the country.
lead_paragraph: Gay rights advocates say disputed therapies to “overcome” homosexuality have caused emotional harm to teenagers.

headline.seo: California Bans Therapies to ‘Cure’ Gay Minors
headline.main: California Is First State to Ban Gay ‘Cure’ for Minors
headline.print_headline: Gay ‘Cure’ For Minors Is Banned In California
